gridsim.net.fnb
Class source_pktNum

Object
  source_pktNum

public class source_pktNum
extends Object

This class is used by the FnbInput entity, to make sure that all Gridlet packets arrive at the destination.

Since:
GridSim Toolkit 4.2
Author:
Agustin Caminero
See Also:
FnbInput
